captions.text:
- Hey, do you still want
to get drinks after work?
- Oh, I actually have to go to the gym.

- Wait, why are you
working out, you're skinny?
- Are you gonna eat all that?

- I feel like I have to watch
you 'cause I'm so fascinated.
Like, where does it all go?

- Ooh, girl, you a
little bony, though, huh?
- I'm just really out of shape.

- My arm flab is insane, I
just, ugh, it drives me crazy.

- Have you seen this skin that
like is underneath my elbow?
- I have a lot of cellulite on my legs.

I don't wanna hear about your
cellulite thank you very much.
- You don't even understand what it's like
to have, like, fat on you.

How do you stay warm
in the winter, I mean.
- Ooh, it is so cold out here, right?

- (scoffs) You gotta put
some meat on your bones.
there's nothing in there but lettuce.

- Geez Louise, does milk
really do a body that good?

- Yeah (gasps) your wrist,
it's so tiny, look at that!

- (Girls together) Look
at her butt, oh my God,

look at her butt wiggle in the
middle but you got much back.

title: 11 Struggles Skinny Girls Know Too Well

comments.text:
"Really? You take martial arts? You don't LOOK like you can beat anyone

comments.text: Not finding non-push up bras in your size.﻿
comments.author: Maya Singh

comments.text:
veveryone at my school assumes I'm depressed. Even though I am, but not the 
way people think. Everyone thinks I starve myself because I'm 15 and weigh 
a little over 80 lbs. And not because i'm short either. Abs since I have 8 
rescue cats I go to school with scratches on my hand every other day. SO 
many people are like "Oh my gosh, you're depressed! Stay strong" "OMG look 
at the scratches on your hand! Are you depressed?" "OMG EVERYONE COME OVER 
HERE LOOK AT  BRITTON'S ARM SHE'S DEPRESSED!! SHE SELF HARMS!!" "hey, you 
look depressed you should attend my church this Sunday my pastor will help 
you threw this" and "OMG YOUR ANOREXIC SO YOUR DEPRESSED!!!" It gets 
annoying﻿
comments.author: SbBc Pets

comments.text:
It really annoys me when people say "Oh my god! You're so skinny! You 
should try eating more!" because for all they know I could have eating 
problems! It is really offensive and it darn right gets on my nerves. 
Another common thing people say to me is "I have seen more meat on a 
chip!". Ugh!﻿
comments.author: sarah hobson

comments.text: Haha some of these are guy problems too~ i always sit in the middle~﻿
comments.author: Jeffrey Lin

comments.text:
Gugh i know the video says "YOU ARE BEAUTIFUL JUST THE WAY YOU ARE" but i 
dont really think of my self as BEAUTIFUL more like fine wateves infact my 
hands are really ugly! In my class i even heard a girl whispering to her 
self "god those fingers are long and skinny" and i knew she was talking 
about mine. I hate being skinny sometimes and here are the reasons why:
1-Sometimes my friend (he's a boy) tells me im skinny and i reply, " you 
better think about that again because im not the only skinny one here MR!!"

2-When my big sis calls she tells me,"did you eat already?" and im 
like,"why?" and she tells me,"oh just asking" i hate it when she asks me 
that (she has her own family btw im an aunt)

3-my uncle calls me "flaca"-->english-skinnygirl (i think)

4-I hate being skinny because im afraid that ppl might see how skinny i am 
and thats why i where jackets or sweaters even when its hot outside or 
inside

I sometimes tell my friend(girl) that i wish i could be fat as her :(
My dad is the one who gave me all these hideous body parts
:'(
Sigh i guess ill be like this 4ever
Btw dont get any ideas about #1 pls
﻿

comments.text: I know this all too well 😒﻿

I also hate it when people make comments like "omg i can feel/see your

comments.text: Pisses me off when people tell me I don't need to go to the gym. ﻿
comments.author: Tara Roy

comments.text:
Imagine being a skinny black woman. The black community skinny shames all 
the time. I naturally have a slender figure and feel the pressure to gain 
weight on a daily basis. If you don't have the typical hourglass shape then 
you're not considered sexy. Black men perpetuate this stereotype the most 
unfortunately.﻿

comments.text:
When i was in the sixth grade my class mate used to be so annoying she kept 
calling me a stick or a piece of wood.... so i used to fight with her 
because she was fat and i called her elephent. But know we are seperated 
and i'm in 8b and she is in 8a but her class mates fighta alot with here 
and i am happy with my new class mates without fights. So know because she 
has fights with her class mates she started hangging out with us , well i 
was happy about that but soon she started making fun at my legs like"oh 
look there is a hole in the middle i can put my hand through it" and when i 
took my blood test she was like"oh did't the kneedle go through your bones 
or where shall they put it you have only bones" but she thinks she is 
jocking but i really want to tell here that what she is doing is not nice. 
For my age it is something bad that i don't gain wait i am turning 14 and i 
am only 40grams, i eat alot but my hand are like only bones covered with 
skin and my legs are so freaking skinny! People think i dont eat and they 
keep laughing at me or stare at me but i have my earphones on so i dont 
hear what they are saying but my health is perfect and i love how i am my 
class mates are amazing and they dont care how thin i am or make fun at me 
and i really want to thank them😊﻿

comments.text:
My Problem is that i am skinny and tall 😁 i am as tall as Taylor swift and 
weigh a little less (just that you can imagine) and yes I may have the body 
of a model but when I wear heels my legs look like super long skinny 
toothpicks and also bc I'm tall I look much skinnier than petite girls and 
everybody is all the time staring at my tigh gap and touching my wrists and 
a lot of people tell me that I have no ass and I'm so frustrated bc 
suddenly everybody wants girls like Kim kardashian and Nicki Minaj and I 
know I will never look like them bc I can't do squats because I have knee 
problems bc of my height and gosh everybody thinks I'm anorexic but I just 
have a super fast metabolism 
It felt really nice to let this out 😊
And sorry for my English 😕
T﻿
comments.author: Helena Potter

comments.text:
i really hate that "fat" people thinks its okay to say "you should get more 
weight you are so skinny" but its never okay for a skinny person to say 
"you should lose weight" it do not feel great to hear you are a stick or 
omg aren't you cold? bc you are so skinny? that hurts just as much if 
people said "omg lose weight" "you shouldn't eat that its not good for

comments.author: Frederikke Birkende

comments.text:
I come from a genetically slim family, my baby sister is so tiny. LMAO. 
tell her she is a Polly Pocket and I could fold her up and put her in my

comments.author: Kika78

comments.text:
On a side note, let's speak up in a kind way! Some people don't realize how 
they hurt when they say things about us being so tiny. Some people just 
need to be told in a kind way once and they stop. ﻿
comments.author: Vania Romans

comments.text:
Let me just say to all of you out there that you should not be ashamed of 
your body! Yes we are thin and we may not be born with huge butts or boobs 
but that does not mean that people can make fun of you and that you should 
be cool with it. If someone says something and it hurts you speak up! It 
isnt right to make fun of someone for being curvy and it isn't right to 
make fun of someone for being thin. Both are shaming someone's natural 
figure and that is never okay. I feel your pain. I am a naturally thin girl 
but I am learning to accept my body ND love myself for who I am. Don't let 
anyone tell you different. And same goes for you curvy girls, you are also 
beautiful. We all are. ﻿
comments.author: Vania Romans

comments.text:
Whatever but the redhead 1:15 is sexy as hell. I'll admit there is a point 
where you are so skinny that it is unattractive, but I'm talking about the 
people you see on google images when you type in anorexia.﻿

:) :) :) :) :)  THIS VIDEO. THIS COMMENT SECTION. THIS EVERYTHING.

comments.author: Andy Griffin

comments.text:
Also believe it or not, we get body shamed a lot. In an effort to make 
bigger girls feel better about themselves ( which is perfectly fine of 
course) ppl put us skinny girls down by saying things like "men like bigger 
girls" (which is saying all body shapes and sizes have to have a preference 
or approval of men?) Or " thick is better than stick". Its always okay to 
show body positivity to larger girls but please don't put us down!﻿

I'm curvy and people tell me I'm skinny and I look at them like Wtf you

that's low (115 lbs.) And I'm 16 but my thighs are literally bigger than my

comments.text: Yassssssssss!!!﻿
comments.author: Princess Cadance

comments.text: Oh my god this is so true. Ugh.﻿
comments.author: Alexis Santha

comments.text:
They are all freakin true, gosh, do they have some life? I'm over them

comments.author: María Paz Bonanni

comments.text:
I hate it when people hate on skinny people just because all the models are 
skinny in an unhealthy, not natural way. Skinny because they hunger. I feel 
bad when people hate around saying "skinny is not beautiful! Beautiful 
women do have some meat on their bones!" and then I imagine looking into 
the mirror and eye up my figure. It's not that I don't have any boobs or 
ass, but my arms and legs are pretty thin, I know that but I can't help. I 
have breakfast every morning, have lunch every noon, and have diner every 
evening and I'm the kind of person who's eating all day, even the unhealthy 
stuff like chocolate and potato chips and gummi bears and whatever you can 
imagine, but I don't gain weight. That's not my fault and it's not my fault 
that other girls think they have to hunger to get as thin as I am and even 
skinnier which definitely is even unhealthier than what I do. 
I don't protect people who hunger or eat so much that their body changes 
massively but I think people should just stop to judge others because of 
their weight. 
Some are born heavier, some are born lighter. 
Deal with it.﻿
comments.author: alice einfachnein

comments.text:
I have a sick fast metabolism so it's annoying when people say where does 
it all go and how can you eat that much trust me I'm thankful but cmon ﻿
comments.author: thecoconutlucie

comments.text:
Skinny is great. I'm a skinny guy and get the 'how do you eat so much' 
thing. Also 'the last time I saw legs like that they were hanging out of a

comments.text:
Omfg I get the cold thing so much! Most of my friends are overweight and 
they always want the windows open and the fans on when its freezing! And it 
sucks cause my boyfriend weighs 120 lbs more than I do and he's literally 
sweating to death while I'm shivering my ass off in bed -_- I also attend 
one of the coldest universities in the country... sometimes being "fat" 
would be helpful!﻿

comments.text:
i'd give anything to be thinner im almost 5ft6 and weight 130 pounds i used

comments.author: Sheena Colbourne

comments.text:
One thing I get from people a lot is "eat a cheeseburger" and seriously the 
next person that tells me to eat a cheeseburger is getting one thrown at 
them. How about, instead of assuming someone doesn't eat simply because 
they're skinny, you consider things like a thyroid condition, a possible 
eating disorder, maybe they're really active, or maybe they're just fucking 
petite. Think before you speak, seriously.﻿
comments.author: Cam Yeah

comments.text:
Some people don't understand that most skinny people are just naturally 
skinny. We don't all starve our selves. Skinny shaming is just as bad as 
fat shaming. There are eating disorders for us too. I remember in middle 
school I would force myself to eat so much to the point of where I would 
get sick just because I hated people for giving me skinny jokes. All it did 
was make me sick. I know some don't make jokes to be malicious or rude but 
no matter what it hurts. Accepting your body is hard especially when 
everyone judges. We are all beautiful in different shapes and sizes. Just 
keep in mind to never body shame anyone no matter what because you never 
know who will take it to heart. <3﻿
comments.author: TheDrummergirl22

comments.text: The awkward moment when none of these girls are skinny..﻿

comments.text:
Everybody always asks if I have an eating disorder or I need a sandwich. I 
get really mad, just because you are skinny does NOT mean you have an 
eating distorder. Skinny Girl problems﻿

also i'm not skinny anymore since after losing 75 pounds.. i gained back
